availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anthony G. Clarke (Greenup County, KY, farmer and English teacher)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer and English teacher. Virginia native. Married to Martha A. Callihan Clarke. Father of Teressa Clarke, Marion Clarke, J. M. Clarke, and J. K. Clarke. Farmer in Greenup County, Kentucky in 1850. English teacher in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 2, p. 206A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, East Little Sandy, p. 882.
